title: Drop Dockerfile.legacy-jar from generated applications

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

`Dockerfile.legacy-jar` is delivered since Quarkus 1.12 when the default switched to fast-jar in PR https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/14753 more than 2 years ago.

I'm not sure we need Dockerfile.legacy-jar in generated applications anymore.

I think it should be OK to remove that artifact from generated applications.

CC @gsmet @geoand @maxandersen @ia3andy 

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
